content: HSL-3-SKR Heavy-duty wedge anchor Ultimate-performance removable heavy-duty wedge anchor with approvals for fire, seismic and cracked concrete (A4 stainless steel, countersunk) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features The flat countersunk head with hexagon socket lies flush with the fixture for discreet fastenings and/or avoidance of tripping hazards Backed by both international ETA and ICC-ESR approvals Easily removable for temporary fastening or retrofitting Applications Structural steel Safety-critical steel elements Balustrades ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless steel, A4 Head configuration: Countersunk Approvals / Test reports: BZS/shock, ETA, Fire, ICC-ES report (concrete) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A4 | Head configuration | Countersunk | Approvals / Test reports | BZS/shock, ETA, Fire, ICC-ES report (concrete) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Outdoor ### ITEMS- 2159874 - Heavy-duty anchor HSL-3-SKR M8/20 - Package Size 40 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-3 SKR M8/20 Heavy-duty anchor assy - 2159875 - Heavy-duty anchor HSL-3-SKR M10/20 - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-3 SKR M10/20 Heavy-duty anchor assy - 2159876 - Heavy-duty anchor HSL-3-SKR M12/25 - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-3-SKR M12/25 Heavy-duty anchor assy
